DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the efficacy and tolerance of 2 dosages (750 versus 500 units) of the Dysport type A botulinic toxin for patient suffering from neurogenic urinary incontinence by an overactive bladder and the failure of anticholinergic drugs.
DOC.brief_title: NEUROTOX: Two Dosages of Type A Botulinic Toxin in Neurogenic Overactive Bladder
DOC.criteria: Neurogenic urinary incontinence with urodynamic overactivity resistant to anticholinergic Pregnancy Bladder cancer Symptomatic urinary infection
